GSD.product_version: versions from v4.11 to before v5.15.63
GSD.description:
net: atlantic: fix aq_vec index out of range error

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.63 by commit 422a02a771599cac96f2b2900d993e0bb7ba5b88, it was introduced in version v4.11 by commit 97bde5c4f909a55ab4c36cf0ac9094f6c9e4cdf6. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: atlantic: fix aq_vec index out of range error
